attributes.action: Building contractors should build play parks for every large housing development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Building contractors should be ordered by law to build play parks or play areas for children for the larger housing developments in the uk.Housing deveplopments continue to spring up all over the uk, but children simply are forced to play on the streets, after the parents have paid out for very large morgages. It would only be fair for play areas to be built out of the large profits received by these companies.

rejection.details: These planning decisions are negotiated at the local government level.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
